traits.name: Experienced Insight
traits.desc: The outlaw has advantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Throwing Specialty
traits.desc: A thrown weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the outlaw hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The outlaw makes two melee attacks or three ranged attacks with its daggers. No more than one of these attacks can be a poisoned dagger.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage or 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage if thrown.

actions.name: Poisoned Dagger (3/Day)
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage or 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage if thrown, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 7 (2d6) poison damage
